finishPayment.warning: Please make the payment according to the amount to transfer, and be aware of the network fees during the transfer.

home.subBannerTitle: In Hash Space, you can enjoy comprehensive all-in-one services tailored to enhance your crypto experience and maximize your mining potential.
home.cardProfessionalText: We strictly screen the mining farms and always provide you with reliable high-quality resources.There will be more miner rigs、power and data centers in the future.
home.cardAutonomyText: You can choose your own mining pools, pay your own electricity bills, and receive coins directly from the mining pool. You can also select your preferred payment methods. All our services put you in control.
home.cardSecurityText: Self-operated mining data centers are located in multiple regions including the United States and Southeast Asia, providing your mining operations with greater flexibility, transparency, and competitiveness.

questions.title: How does Hash Space work?
questions.text: First, you will select one of the plans in Hash Space. Then you pay for the hash power and deposit electricity fees. Our partner from the mining farm will handle the rest of the configuration process, power management, and miner maintenance on your behalf. As a client, you only need to add cryptocurrency address, then you can enjoy our one-stop services and receive the mining revenue from that mining pool.

questions.title: What are the available payment methods？
questions.text: We support crypto payment in USDT（ERC20）、USDT（TRC20）and USDC（ERC20）.

questions.title: Who are the owners of the mining machines?
questions.text: The mining machines, that are producing hash power that are sold on the Hash Space platform, are owned by Hash Space. Hash Space provides technical services for buyers. Currently our miners are hosted in the data center in United States, and there will be more data centers in the future.

questions.title: Where is the mining farm located?
questions.text: Hash Space provides technical services for hash power buyers. Currently our miners are hosted in the data center in United States, and there will be more data centers in the future. United States has a deregulated power grid, abundant power resources, and friendly mining policies, making it an ideal location.

questions.title: How is the electricity fee calculated? Can the fee be deducted from earnings? What other fees are there?
questions.text: The current electricity rate is 0.1$ kW/h, but rates are subject to change. The electricity fee will not be directly deducted from your earnings so you must manually deposit funds to your balance, and maintain at least 1 day worth of electric fees.* Excluding electricity fees, clients have no additional fees.

questions.title: What are the differences between Hash Space and similar services?
questions.text: Compared with other existing products of the same type, Hash Space has three notable features.1. We only choose trusted hash power providers through strict criteria to provide clients with the very services.2. Our products allow clients to choose their preferred mining pools instead of forcibly binding them to one mining pool. With this, clients are given flexibility.3. We entrust the entire process of cloud computing to the mining pool that you, the client sets. We also have no participation in the management and maintenance of the miners themselves.

questions.title: Is real-name authentication required to purchase a plan?
questions.text: For security concerns, we require all users who purchase hash power from Hash Space to complete the real-name authentication (also called“KYC”) and AML. Some clients may be required to be accredited investors before purchasing our plans.

questions.title: Can I get a refund after purchasing a plan?
questions.text: The fees paid by clients during the purchase and use of Hash Space’s products are non-refundable. Please read our Terms of Service and Disclaimer carefully. If you have any questions during the purchase or use, you can contact us at any time. (Email: support@cyberleap.us）

questions.title: Can I choose any pools I’d like to use?
questions.text: Any mining pools that are protocol compatible with our Miner Agent will be supported. Currently F2Pool are available.

questions.title: Who will pay the mining revenue?
questions.text: Hash Space only provides the sales service of the right to use of the hash power. Mining revenue will be paid by the mining pool.

questions.title: What is the criteria for choosing a hash power provider?
questions.text: To provide our clients with the most reliable service, we have created a detailed inspection checklist for hash power providers. This inspection includes an enterprise background investigation, an on-site inspection that includes maintenance and servicing of site, crypto policy research, communication evaluation of provider, and ongoing re-evaluations.

firstConfirm.declarationContent: I confirm and declare that I am not a resident of Cuba, Iran, North Korea, Syria, or any other country or region subject to sanctions imposed by relevant countries, governments, or international organizations. The services provided by Hash Space comply with the laws, regulations, and policies applicable in my country or region.
firstConfirm.declarationDesc: I acknowledge that any legal risks and liabilities arising from the use of services provided by Hash Space in my country or region, where such use is illegal, will be solely my responsibility.
